Name: OUTSCHOOL Clip 1: "Not All Screen Time Is Created Equal" (As previously compiled - this works well)
Notes/Contributors:
Not all screen time is created equal. Building virtual worlds is completely different from passive watching - it's where kids can safely practice real-world skills they naturally want to learn.

The difference is visible: a child after watching YouTube has a different look than one who comes away from creative classes brimming with excitement and ideas.

#screentime #parenting #digitallearning #virtualworlds #kidseducation #creativity
